item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1583; 09:05PM; 22255 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3e0uguB; #WoodlandHills; *Corrected Address* 28 Firefighters extinguished the flames in 35 minutes. CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1381; 06:59PM; 3483 N Barham Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3dRizX6; #HollywoodHills; 45 Firefighters mounted a coordinated attack to quickly surround the brush fire and extinguish the flames in 40 minutes, holding it to less than one-quarter of an acre. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AR1 BC14 BC18 BC5 CM40 CM42 E227 E260 E27 E290 E52 E60 E76 E82 E86 E90 EM14 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 RA82 RA86 T27 T60 T90; CH5; 16; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1381; 06:19PM; 3600 N Barham Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ruhwdj; #HollywoodHills; Approximately one-quarter of an acre of light-to-medium brush on fire. Light wind. No structures threatened.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC5 E227 E260 E27 E290 E52 E60 E76 E82 E86 E90 EM14 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 RA86 T27 T60 T90; CH5; 16; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1185; 05:15PM; 10377 N Rincon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cSuMu5; #Pacoima; It took 24 firefighters 19 minutes to extinguish the fully-involved single-family home, despite live wires down and a roof collapse at the site of a previous burn. Firefighters successfully defended the neighboring structures. Primary and secondary searches of the structure were clear (no patients found). No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC12 E275 E298 E75 E98 RA98 T75 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1185; 04:56PM; 13660 W Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DZurB9; #Pacoima; One-story single-family home with fire showing, site of a previous burn, with at least one other structure threatened. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E75 E98 RA98 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Auto vs Pedestrian; INC#0875; 01:49PM; 4927 S Huntington Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3fs5RP8; #ElSereno; LAFD responded to a traffic collision where, sadly, a vehicle fatally struck a worker tending to the center-divider landscape, before the vehicle ultimately rolled over. The driver self extricated and was transported to the hospital in fair condition. LAPD Inc #2556. Nothing further. ; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E1 E16 E201 E47 EM1 HR3 RA2 RA47 T1; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0502; 09:38AM; 243 E 59th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UGuW93; #Florence; *Address Corrected* DETAILS: 39 Firefighters took just 19 minutes to access, confine and completely extinguish a fully involved 766 square-foot one story home at the rear of the property, preventing fire spread to nearby structures. One male civilian (unknown age / medical condition / site affiliation) was found outside the home with significant burn injury, and is being transported to an area hospital by LAFD Paramedics. No other injuries reported. The fire is considered suspicious, and the burned male will be interviewed by law enforcement (LAPD Newton Division Incident #1406) to determine his relationship if any, to the cause of the fire.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E21 E221 E233 E264 E33 E46 EM13 RA246 RA264 RA846 SQ21 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0502; 09:19AM; 157 E 59th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xZcJtM; #Florence; *Address Tentative* - PRELIM: Heavy fire throughout an approximately 900 square-foot single family home to the rear of the property, with flames threatening a nearby home. ; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E21 E221 E233 E264 E33 E46 RA264 RA846 SQ21 T21 T33 T64 ; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Pedestrian Struck - Fatality; INC#1689; 10:14PM; 10601 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UB3gT7; #BroadwayManchester; PRELIM: One pedestrian deceased at scene after reportedly being struck by vehicle. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #4729) and Coroner.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; E264 RA33 T64; CH4; Brian Humphrey
